casebody.data:
David LeRoy LATHMAN v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 5340. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. May 24, 1956. Paul W. Cress, U. S. Atty., and H. Dale Cook, Asst. U. S. Atty., Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, and MURRAH and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without opinion.
